descriptionHtml:
I got a little thought in my head, Why don\'t skyrim have portals to oblivion? I really like the daedra and dremoras, so I decided to try making my own little place for them to hang out (: 

I\'ve got a lot of fixing to do, I know. This is my first dungeoun. But I thought I\'d put it up here so that people might want to help me.
 The most annoying problem is that the dremoras just randomly seem to dissapear... And I just don\'t know how to solve this problem :c

Well, anyway. It\'s located just outside of Riverwood and once you\'ve found it, you can teleport there (:
author: Miaouwsan
